img_text: KODABLACK SAID ya wanna a Lil baby. Who gone listen ya don't even listen to what yak said Go READ IT "She's finna be a whole widow out here. I'll be the best man I can be for her. I'll give her a whole year. She might need a whole year to be crying and sh't for him." (Ig@outcheabih) He continued: "I ain't trying to shoot [my shot] at her. I'm saying, listen. She can do two, three years. I'll try to be like the friend if you need to holla or a shoulder to lean on. She can call my line."
